english.segment1: Hear no evil, see no evil. Speak no evil. On the outside. Full of pride, full of lies. So well they hide. On the inside
english.segment2: They'll never be. All that they seem. They live the life of a Pharisee
english.segment3: Not perfect on the surface T So far to go T On the outside. But a true heart T And a new start is what lives on the inside
english.segment4: For whom the Son has set free. He is free. Free indeed
english.segment5: Receive the Son who makes us free. Then you will be free indeed
